title: GraphQL 101
lead: A quick look at what GraphQL is, how to write a simple server, how to make queries, and what benefits it can have over REST.

title: An introduction to GraphQL
lead: An itroductory workshop given to students on the full-stack coding bootcamp. Students wrote a small GraphQL server by the end of the workshop.

title: Programe en 6 meses ¡YA!
lead: As a guest on the podcast "Todo Está Mal" I talk about my experience of coding bootcamps and we discuss the pros and cons of the route into software development. (in Spanish)
